pullrequest.title: Replaced boost::shared_ptr with std::shared_ptr in Physics

content.raw: ugh, yeah, I did not consider the repercussions of forcing downstream users to migrate to C++11, especially since [ROS Jade](http://www.ros.org/reps/rep-0003.html) will target C++03, though it will compile under a C++11 compiler. I think this is something that needs to happen eventually, but perhaps I should first focus my `sed` powers on replacing structures that do not effect API... `boost::thread` and `boost::mutex` are ideal candidates for replacement
